summary: Provides a conversation management utility for multimodal AI models, handling the accumulation, duplication, serialization, and extraction of text and media messages, and converting the dialogue into formats suitable for prompt construction and UI components such as Gradio chat.
business_intent: Facilitates the development of chat-based multimodal applications by offering a structured way to store and manipulate dialogue histories, generate model-ready prompts, and render conversations in user interfaces.
